item.description:
This is a joint event with the New England Blues and Brews Meetup and Boston Blues Meetup groups.

Let's start out at 7PM at Watch City and then head over to Jake's Dixie Roadhouse for some grub and more beers. Blues, brews, BBQ.... what more could we want?
item.how_to_find_us: Susan and I will most likely be the coolest, funnest people in the room... oh, and maybe we'll both wear Red Sox hats, or something like that. Keep you posted!
item.why: It's a chance to meet some new folks and it involves beer - that's basically what this group is all about! :)
item.name: A Saturday Three-Way: Watch City and Jake's Dixie Double Whammy
